Package ninja.uploads

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileItem
    This interface represents a file or form item that was received within a multipart/form-data POST request.
    FileItemProvider
    This interface represents a file item provider, to create FileItem for each uploaded file.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DiskFileItemProvider
    FileItemProvider that save uploaded files on disk, in a temporary folder.
    MemoryFileItemProvider
    FileItemProvider that save uploaded files in memory.
    NoFileItemProvider
    FileItemProvider default's implementation, to indicate to not handle uploaded files, and let the users deal with the request by themselves
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    FileProvider
    Indicates that this annotation should use the given file provider to handle uploaded files.
